attributes.action: To provide funds for   adoptive children to search globally for a stem cell donor if family can not be found pay for treatment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the recent  global search of a British national who is residing in Australia Graham Barnell was adopted as a child in the UK .Graham  is now critically ill with myleiod leukeamia and looking at raising funds to go to the US for treatment.We ask the Govenment to improve the current system and fast track information concerning medical data to adoptive children/adultsin life threatening situations.When all options are exhasted to assist with funding treatment .
